verses.verse: Remember <S%H2142><s%> now <S%H853><s%> thy Creator <S%H1254><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy youth, <S%H979><s%> while <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> come <S%H935><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> nor the years <S%H8141><s%> draw nigh, <S%H5060><s%> when <S%H834><s%> thou shalt say, <S%H559><s%> I have no <S%H369><s%> pleasure <S%H2656><s%> in them;

While <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> the sun, <S%H8121><s%> or the light, <S%H216><s%> or the moon, <S%H3394><s%> or the stars, <S%H3556><s%> be not <S%H3808><s%> darkened, <S%H2821><s%> nor the clouds <S%H5645><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the rain: <S%H1653><s%>

In the day <S%H3117><s%> when the keepers <S%H8104><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> shall tremble, <S%H7945><s%> <S%H2111><s%> and the strong <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> shall bow themselves, <S%H5791><s%> and the grinders <S%H2912><s%> cease <S%H988><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they are few, <S%H4591><s%> and those that look <S%H7200><s%> out of the windows <S%H699><s%> be darkened, <S%H2821><s%>

And the doors <S%H1817><s%> shall be shut <S%H5462><s%> in the streets, <S%H7784><s%> when the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the grinding <S%H2913><s%> is low, <S%H8213><s%> and he shall rise up <S%H6965><s%> at the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the bird, <S%H6833><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of music <S%H7892><s%> shall be brought low; <S%H7817><s%>

Also <S%H1571><s%> when they shall be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of that which is high, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1364><s%> and fears <S%H2849><s%> shall be in the way, <S%H1870><s%> and the almond tree <S%H8247><s%> shall flourish, <S%H5006><s%> and the grasshopper <S%H2284><s%> shall be a burden, <S%H5445><s%> and desire <S%H35><s%> shall fail: <S%H6565><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> man <S%H120><s%> goeth <S%H1980><s%> to <S%H413><s%> his long <S%H5769><s%> home, <S%H1004><s%> and the mourners <S%H5594><s%> go about <S%H5437><s%> the streets: <S%H7784><s%>

Or <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H834><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> cord <S%H2256><s%> be loosed, <S%H7368><s%> or the golden <S%H2091><s%> bowl <S%H1543><s%> be broken, <S%H7533><s%> or the pitcher <S%H3537><s%> be broken <S%H7665><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the fountain, <S%H4002><s%> or the wheel <S%H1534><s%> broken <S%H7533><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the cistern. <S%H953><s%>

Then shall the dust <S%H6083><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> as it was: <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1961><s%> and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> God <S%H430><s%> who <S%H834><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> it.
Vanity <S%H1892><s%> of vanities, <S%H1892><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the preacher; <S%H6953><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> is vanity. <S%H1892><s%>

And moreover, <S%H3148><s%> because the preacher <S%H6953><s%> was <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1961><s%> wise, <S%H2450><s%> he still <S%H5750><s%> taught <S%H3925><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> knowledge; <S%H1847><s%> yea, he gave good heed, <S%H238><s%> and sought out, <S%H2713><s%> and set in order <S%H8626><s%> many <S%H7235><s%> proverbs. <S%H4912><s%>

The preacher <S%H6953><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> to find out <S%H4672><s%> acceptable <S%H2656><s%> words: <S%H1697><s%> and that which was written <S%H3789><s%> was upright, <S%H3476><s%> even words <S%H1697><s%> of truth. <S%H571><s%>

The words <S%H1697><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> are as goads, <S%H1861><s%> and as nails <S%H4930><s%> fastened <S%H5193><s%> by the masters <S%H1167><s%> of assemblies, <S%H627><s%> which are given <S%H5414><s%> from one shepherd. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7462><s%> <S%H259><s%>

And further, <S%H3148><s%> by these, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1992><s%> my son, <S%H1121><s%> be admonished: <S%H2094><s%> of making <S%H6213><s%> many <S%H7235><s%> books <S%H5612><s%> there is no <S%H369><s%> end; <S%H7093><s%> and much <S%H7235><s%> study <S%H3854><s%> is a weariness <S%H3024><s%> of the flesh. <S%H1320><s%>

Let us hear <S%H8085><s%> the conclusion <S%H5490><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> matter: <S%H1697><s%> Fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H853><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments: <S%H4687><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> is the whole <S%H3605><s%> duty of man. <S%H120><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> God <S%H430><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> into judgment, <S%H4941><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> secret thing, <S%H5956><s%> whether <S%H518><s%> it be good, <S%H2896><s%> or whether <S%H518><s%> it be evil. <S%H7451><s%>
